description.value: You transcend the limitations of form. While under the effects of wild shape, you can change into any other form on your wild shape list; if the durations of the forms would vary, use the shorter of the two durations. Once per day, you can transform into a kaiju, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Nature Incarnate]; if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Plant Shape], you can instead transform into a green man.
